Title: Automated Legacy Code Migration Agent (Java to Python)
Description: Engineered a self-correcting autonomous agent using LangGraph and Groq (Llama 3.3) that iteratively migrates legacy Java code to Python, utilizing a static analysis feedback loop to autonomously resolve syntax errors and reduce manual refactoring effort by 40%.
